pullrequest.title: Disable tests compilation by default. New 'make tests' target.

content.raw:
I don't think that works. I checked out this branch and did the following:

~~~
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make test
~~~

It doesn't compile anything; it immediately starts to try to run all the tests, and they all fail because they haven't been compiled.
content.html:
I don't think that works. I checked out this branch and did the following:

mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make test

It doesn't compile anything; it immediately starts to try to run all the tests, and they all fail because they haven't been compiled.
